languages.text: "О крови героев, в которой отражается блеск звезд. О снеге, по которому тянутся цепочки следов немилосердных охотников. О фузелиновом тумане, стелющемся над раздираемыми падальщиками трупами". {n}Мягкая, добрая улыбка касается губ рыжеволосого.{/n} "В общем, о доме".

"It is about starlight glittering in the blood of heroes. Snow marked by the footsteps of merciless hunters. The fyceline haze that hangs over corpses torn apart by scavengers." {n}A small, warm smile touches his lips.{/n} "In a word — home."
languages.original_text: "О крови героев, в которой отражается блеск звезд. О снеге, по которому тянутся цепочки следов немилосердных охотников. О фузелиновом тумане, стелющемся над раздираемыми падальщиками трупами". {n}Мягкая, добрая улыбка касается губ рыжеволосого.{/n} "В общем, о доме".

traits.locale_text: "It is about starlight glittering in the blood of heroes. Snow marked by the footsteps of merciless hunters. The fyceline haze that hangs over corpses torn apart by scavengers." {n}A small, warm smile touches his lips.{/n} "In a word — home."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: "It is about starlight glittering in the blood of heroes. Snow marked by the footsteps of merciless hunters. The fyceline haze that hangs over corpses torn apart by scavengers." {n}A small, warm smile touches his lips.{/n} "In a word — home."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: “这首歌讲述的是，关于英雄的鲜血闪烁着群星的光芒，关于雪地上无情的猎手留下的足迹，关于被腐食动物撕碎的尸体上笼罩的恶臭。”{n}他的嘴边似乎泛起了一丝温暖的微笑。{/n}“简而言之——是关于家的。”
languages.original_text: "It is about starlight glittering in the blood of heroes. Snow marked by the footsteps of merciless hunters. The fyceline haze that hangs over corpses torn apart by scavengers." {n}A small, warm smile touches his lips.{/n} "In a word — home."

traits.locale_text: “这首歌讲述的是，关于英雄的鲜血闪烁着群星的光芒，关于雪地上无情的猎手留下的足迹，关于被腐食动物撕碎的尸体上笼罩的恶臭。”{n}他的嘴边似乎泛起了一丝温暖的微笑。{/n}“简而言之——是关于家的。”
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: 「英雄の血に輝く星の光…無慈悲なハンターの足跡が残る雪、腐食肉者たちによって引き裂かれた死体の上をゆらめくファイセリン燃料のもやについて歌ってる」{n}彼は小さくも暖かい笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「つまるところ、故郷の歌さ」
languages.original_text: "It is about starlight glittering in the blood of heroes. Snow marked by the footsteps of merciless hunters. The fyceline haze that hangs over corpses torn apart by scavengers." {n}A small, warm smile touches his lips.{/n} "In a word — home."

traits.locale_text: 「英雄の血に輝く星の光…無慈悲なハンターの足跡が残る雪、腐食肉者たちによって引き裂かれた死体の上をゆらめくファイセリン燃料のもやについて歌ってる」{n}彼は小さくも暖かい笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「つまるところ、故郷の歌さ」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: «Es sobre la luz de las estrellas reflejándose en la sangre de los héroes. Sobre la nieve marcada por las pisadas de cazadores implacables. De la niebla de fycelina que cubre los cadáveres despedazados por los carroñeros». {n}Una pequeña y cálida sonrisa aparece en sus labios.{/n} «En resumen: sobre el hogar».
languages.original_text: "It is about starlight glittering in the blood of heroes. Snow marked by the footsteps of merciless hunters. The fyceline haze that hangs over corpses torn apart by scavengers." {n}A small, warm smile touches his lips.{/n} "In a word — home."

traits.locale_text: «Es sobre la luz de las estrellas reflejándose en la sangre de los héroes. Sobre la nieve marcada por las pisadas de cazadores implacables. De la niebla de fycelina que cubre los cadáveres despedazados por los carroñeros». {n}Una pequeña y cálida sonrisa aparece en sus labios.{/n} «En resumen: sobre el hogar».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: « Elle parle du reflet des étoiles dans le sang des héros. Des traces de chasseurs sans merci dans la neige. Du nuage de fyceline qui s'échappe des cadavres déchiquetés par des charognards. Elle parle de chez moi. » {n}Un sourire attendri étire ses lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is about starlight glittering in the blood of heroes. Snow marked by the footsteps of merciless hunters. The fyceline haze that hangs over corpses torn apart by scavengers." {n}A small, warm smile touches his lips.{/n} "In a word — home."

traits.locale_text: « Elle parle du reflet des étoiles dans le sang des héros. Des traces de chasseurs sans merci dans la neige. Du nuage de fyceline qui s'échappe des cadavres déchiquetés par des charognards. Elle parle de chez moi. » {n}Un sourire attendri étire ses lèvres.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: "Es geht um Sternenlicht, das im Blut von Helden glitzert. Um Spuren gnadenloser Jäger im Schnee. Der Fycelin-Dunst, der über von Plünderern zerrissenen Leichen hängt." {n}Ein kleines, warmes Lächeln umspielt seine Lippen.{/n} "Mit einem Wort – Heimat."
languages.original_text: "It is about starlight glittering in the blood of heroes. Snow marked by the footsteps of merciless hunters. The fyceline haze that hangs over corpses torn apart by scavengers." {n}A small, warm smile touches his lips.{/n} "In a word — home."

traits.locale_text: "Es geht um Sternenlicht, das im Blut von Helden glitzert. Um Spuren gnadenloser Jäger im Schnee. Der Fycelin-Dunst, der über von Plünderern zerrissenen Leichen hängt." {n}Ein kleines, warmes Lächeln umspielt seine Lippen.{/n} "Mit einem Wort – Heimat."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.original_text: "It is about starlight glittering in the blood of heroes. Snow marked by the footsteps of merciless hunters. The fyceline haze that hangs over corpses torn apart by scavengers." {n}A small, warm smile touches his lips.{/n} "In a word — home."

languages.text: "Kahramanların kanına vuran yıldız ışığının parıltısını, merhametsiz avcıların ayak izleriyle damgalanan karı, hurdacıların paramparça ettiği cesetler üzerinde kalan fiselin pusunu anlatıyor." {n}Dudaklarında ufak, sıcacık bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Başka bir deyişle... Yuvamı anlatıyor."
languages.original_text: "It is about starlight glittering in the blood of heroes. Snow marked by the footsteps of merciless hunters. The fyceline haze that hangs over corpses torn apart by scavengers." {n}A small, warm smile touches his lips.{/n} "In a word — home."

traits.locale_text: "Kahramanların kanına vuran yıldız ışığının parıltısını, merhametsiz avcıların ayak izleriyle damgalanan karı, hurdacıların paramparça ettiği cesetlerin üzerinde kalan fiselin pusunu anlatıyor." {n}Dudaklarında ufak, sıcacık bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Başka bir deyişle... Yuvamı anlatıyor."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
